video.title: Dream School
video.synopsis: In this documentary series, celebrity teachers try to redirect the lives of high school dropouts whose difficult attitudes are anything but a dream.

episodes.synopsis: Homeroom teachers David Arquette and 50 Cent welcome the 15 expelled students and dropouts who are getting a last chance to earn a diploma.
episodes.title: 50 Cent, Oliver Stone, David Arquette & Cliff Dorfman

episodes.synopsis: Inspirational celebrity teachers address students' poor test results. The kids take on an emotional exercise, while a few remain unreached.
episodes.title: Jeff Corwin, Soledad O'Brien, David Arquette & Doriana Sanchez

episodes.synopsis: The students get taken out of their comfort zone and must put personal problems aside during the third week of Dream School.
episodes.title: Music with Swizz Beatz

episodes.synopsis: It's halfway through Dream School, and some students have reached a crisis point. Celebrity teachers continue to push, but will the students make it?
episodes.title: History with Oliver Stone

episodes.synopsis: The last celebrity teachers bring their talents and enthusiasm to the school. Can Dream School succeed where traditional education did not?
episodes.title: Suze Orman's Smackdown

episodes.synopsis: Emotions run high, and there are plenty of tears when the kids get their final results. Who will make it to graduation?
episodes.title: The Final Test
